trans-unit.source: Using the <see cref="N:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader" /> namespace, you can develop applications that read and manage event logs.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="N:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader" /> 命名空间可以开发用于读取和管理事件日志的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: An event in an event log contains information, a warning, or an error that has been published by a specific application, service, or operating system component.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志中的事件包含由特定应用程序、服务或操作系统组件发布的信息、警告或错误。

trans-unit.source: These events are read by applications that monitor a computer's health and applications that take action when specific events occur.
trans-unit.target: 这些事件由监视计算机运行状况的应用程序读取，还可以由发生特定事件时执行操作的应用程序读取。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Technology Summary for Reading and Managing Event Logs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671205.aspx) and [Event Log Scenarios](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671204.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[读取和管理事件日志的技术摘要](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671205.aspx)和[事件日志方案](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb671204.aspx)。
